column4: cannot log into live cd it neded a username and password what should i do?
the username is ubuntu, the password is empty
no, why do you need a username anyway - did you log out of the session?
what version of the live CD?
what happens when you boot the live CD?
it gives me the username screen
I have never seen that before, are you certain that it is the ubuntu live CD?
press <ctrl><alt>F1 to get to a virtual terminal
then what should i do ?
what do you read there?
: is says authentication failure
let me try
step by step: what happens when you boot - do get the menu to select "try ..." ?
then it is not the live CD, what do you get instead?
please use my nick or I might overlook your answer - on that screen you press a key and get what?
: i donot press any key i wait until it goes to the login screen
did you even boot from the CD, could be you are looking at your own system's log in
i put the cd and the first boot is from cd
listen to the drive - does it really boot from it?
: yes
should i download the live cd again ?
sorry, that seems impossible to me, before you download it again please run and md5 check on the iso file from which you burnt the CD
